attributes.title: Beware of this app!

attributes.title: Made me cry :(((
attributes.review: This app is cursed!! Ever since I downloaded this app I have had nothing but bad luck! My fish died, I lost my lawn mower and I canâ€™t find my car keys!! I have had multiple mental breakdowns over these tragedies and called/texted my therapist to the point of her blocking me.... AND in top of all that i have had non-stop vomiting and diarrhea! All of this is because if this app, I downloaded it and my life went down hill. Other than being cursed the app took FOREVER to download, caused my phone to freeze for hours and when it finally unfroze it played loud obnoxious music causing my cat to have a seizer and die. My life will never be the same.
